content: tunisian wash cloth tss tunisian simple stitch tps tunisian purl stitch tks tunisian knit stitch lts work through the last stitch catching the 2nd loop retp return pass foundation row chain 33 from the 2nd stitch from the hook pull up back loop in each stitch across 33 stitches retp row 1 tss 1 tps 1 through to the last stitch tss 1 lts retp row 2 tps 1 tss 1 through to the last stitch tps 1 lts retp row 3 - 5 repeat row 1 & 2 end of row 1 row 6 tps 1 tss 1 x 3 tks19 tss 1 tps 1 x 3 tss 1 lts retp row 7 tss 1 tps 1 x 3 tks 19 tps 1 tss 1 x 3 tps 1 lts retp row 8 tps 1 tss 1 x 3 tks 2 tss 6 tks 3 tss 6 tks 2 tss 1 tps 1 x 3 tss 1 lts retp row 9 tss 1 tps 1 x 3 tks 2 tss 6 tks 3 tss 6 tks 2 tps 1 tss 1 x 3 tps 1 lts retp row 10-12 repeat row 8 and 9 end on row 8 row 13-14 repeat row 6 & 7 row 15 tss 1 tps 1 x 3 tks 2 tss 6 tks 3 tss 6 tks 2 tps 1 tss 1 x 3 tps 1 lts retp row 16 tps 1 tss 1 x 3 tks 2 tss 6 tks 3 tss 6 tks 2 tss 1 tps 1 x 3 tss 1 lts retp row 17-19 repeat row 15 and 16 end on row 15 row 20-28 repeat row 6 -14 row 29-33 repeat row 1-5 slip_stitch bind off in pattern loosely after the last row cut yarn leaving 8 tail to weave in fasten_off and weave in ends link to google sheets with the chart https //docs google com/spreadsheets/d/1wdmjq0-ndmhowtyzglo-kv8cfg3hquciuuhzu4f4lvc/edit gid=0#g id=0
